name: Haunted House Experience: Pembrokeshire Manor House
name_original: Haunted House Experience: Pembrokeshire Manor House
description:
HAUNTED HOUSE EXPERIENCE: PEMBROKESHIRE MANOR HOUSE.

Important!. This is day 1 release and will likely recieve an update before episode 2.

Description:

You have become trapped in a haunted house and must use your patience and wits to solve puzzle's, find keys and avoid enemies in this spooky escape simulator.

Controls:

W,A,S,D = Move Player

Left Shift = Run

Space = Jump

Mouse = Look Around

C = Activate Night Vision

E = Interact / Pickup

Shadows = Hide From Enemy

Escape = Pause

Rules:

1: You must solve any puzzle's and find any key's you need to be able to escape.

2: Once you have found the "Master Key" you will be able to leave via the same door you came in at.

3: To get your money worth out of the game it is strongly advised to play it as if your life is actually on the line and you WILL DIE if caught by the enemy!. "Nun Massacre"

That's all.
